profile.name: A Akhil
profile.summary: I am a machine learning engineer who builds things that matter.
bio: I'm a passionate AI/ML developer and researcher currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science with specialization in AI-ML at SRM Institute of Science and Technology. My journey in artificial intelligence has been marked by groundbreaking research experiences at India's premier organizations.

From developing AI models for defense applications at DRDO to creating recommendation engines for space technology at ISRO, my work spans across cutting-edge domains of artificial intelligence and machine learning.

My expertise spans machine learning, deep learning, computer vision, natural language processing, and full-stack development. I believe in the power of AI to solve real-world problems and create meaningful impact.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Innovative AI/ML solutions solving real-world problems across various domains

items.title: Machine Learning for Diabetic Prediction
items.description: Conducted a comparative study on Ridge, Lasso, and ElasticNet regression models, achieving a prediction accuracy of up to 88%. Implemented and optimized models in Java, processing datasets with over 10,000 patient records.

items.title: Advanced Traffic Sign Detection
items.description: A research paper introducing an innovative methodology for small object detection with a focus on traffic signs, achieving a reduction in detection errors by 79%. Conducted 100+ experiments using datasets containing over 50,000 images.

items.title: Real-time Parking Detection
items.description: Developed a real-time parking detection system to monitor 200+ parking slots using computer vision technology. Utilized Python and OpenCV to process live video feeds, detecting vacant spaces with 94% accuracy.

items.title: Mental Health Assessment System
items.description: Developed a Flask web application to assess mental health for 1,000+ students, analyzing responses to pre-defined questions. Integrated an LLM via Ollama AI to generate scores with 95% accuracy.

items.title: Cloud and Fog Removal using GAN
items.description: Enhanced satellite image clarity by 84% by optimizing ISRO's models for cloud and fog removal. Designed and implemented a GAN-based system leveraging SPANet architecture to process over 10,000 satellite images efficiently.

items.title: Real Time Crime Detection
items.description: Designed and implemented a Crime Detection system that analyzed live CCTV footage from 50+ cameras to identify suspicious activities. Achieved real-time classification of criminal activities with 90% accuracy.

items.title: AI-Generated Text Detection System
items.description: Built an AI-Generated Text Detection System with 92% accuracy in distinguishing AI-generated from human-written text. Processed 50,000+ text samples to train and validate models for content moderation.

items.title: Chat Application
items.description: Developed a cross-platform chat application enabling real-time communication for over 500 users. Integrated Firebase for real-time database synchronization, ensuring 99.9% uptime and instant message delivery.

publications.title: Zonal HNSW: Scalable Approximate Nearest Neighbor Search for Billion-Scale Datasets
publications.venue: 3rd International Conference on Self Sustainable Artificial Intelligence Systems (ICSSAS)
description: Proposed Zonal HNSW, a scalable framework for billion-scale Approximate Nearest Neighbor (ANN) search.
Achieved up to 3√ó faster search speed, 98.7% recall@10, and a 29% reduction in index size compared to FAISS, Annoy, and HNSW.
Benchmarked on SIFT1B, DEEP1B, GLOVE-1.2M, and MUSIC100M using NVIDIA DGX A100.
